topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c48556368721875000b6f#post_559c48556368721875000b6f
I have a feeling a lot of people are going to get angry at the anime and making threads telling people to "stfu about your monster girls" because whenever a very popular manga gets a okay anime the popularity of it instantly skyrockets and as a result that causes popularity backlash which ironically causes more people to check it out and as a result increases the popularity of it which the company uses the popularity of it to justify making more merchandise and that.


Basically what I mean by all this is that my money is on the anime gets 5 to 10 seasons; have multiple video games and a metric fuck ton of merchandise.  The keychains are just the first merchandise to come out.
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c4a746368720b8d000435#post_559c4a746368720b8d000435
Jesus christ; it hasn't even been a day since the anime has initially aired.
